name: orache
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a plant with green leaves that can be eaten as a vegetable: Common orache is rich in vitamin C. This variety of orache has attractive triangular leaves.
More examplesFewer examplesOrache can overwhelm a garden if you don't pull it out before it produces its seeds.Butterflies darted around among the red orache and pink-flowered valerian.We served our guests a salad made with spinach, orache, and bacon.I decided to order the poached halibut with orache.
